title: Sephyre ANSWER MY QUESTIONS!
body:
So answer my questions please.

What's stopping someone from trolling at champ select? e.g "mid or feed, mid or afk"???

What's stopping someone from trolling in game? e.g walking around the map taunting team mates and not attking enemies on purpose??

What's stopping someone from running around in circles at the base?  (i know your crappy afk detection doesn't detect this because I've tried it)

No need to answer, they were rhetorical questions!!!

Still working on that imaginary tribunal? 

What a joke !

replies.body:
Hey dude,

If someone acts up in champ select then the best thing to do is to report them in the end of game screen.

With the system that's live, they will be flagged when they are reported. The system will also sort out false reports. With the new reform system, it will evaluate their behaviour in game in a much faster way. 

In your example about a player walking around the map, taunting and not attacking, they'll get reported and will face restrictions and potentially bans. As I mentioned to you in the FAQ thread it's really important that you report any negative behaviour you see, including in champion select.

With your example about afks, the updated LeaverBuster can detect when you aren't contributing to a game and you'll be evaluated for restrictions. 

I had a look at your account and I can see you have been restricted by LeaverBuster as recently as a few weeks ago. Similarly for other players that afk in games you are in, they'll be picked up and face restrictions and potentially bans if they keep doing it.
